description.zh: 最大化夏普比率，平衡风险收益，适合新手和长期稳定交易
description.en: Maximize Sharpe Ratio, balanced risk-reward, suitable for beginners and long-term stable trading

description.zh: 专注于 BTC 区间交易的阶梯式策略
description.en: Ladder strategy focused on BTC range trading

description.zh: 强调资金保全和风险控制，严格执行纪律，适合保守型交易者
description.en: Emphasizes capital preservation and risk control, strict discipline execution, suitable for conservative traders

description.zh: 根据市场条件动态调整，偏保守风格
description.en: Dynamically adjusts to market conditions, conservative style

description.zh: 更激进的交易风格，追求更高收益
description.en: More aggressive trading style, pursuing higher returns

description.zh: 使用英文提示词的专业框架
专注于做多机会的策略
description.en: Strategy focused on long position opportunities
